General.Name: Netmarble Games Corp
General.Description: Netmarble Corporation, along with its subsidiaries, develops and publishes online and mobile games in South Korea and internationally. It also engages in apparel, asset management, real estate development, and advertising and marketing businesses. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: G-valley Biz Plaza, Seoul, South Korea, 152-848
